snippet: An indicted businessman had accused Attorney General John Swallow of arranging a deal to pay Senator Harry Reid to quash a federal investigation.
abstract: Utah Atty Gen John Swallow is cleared in bribery investigation by Justice Department; indicted businessman Jeremy Johnson had accused him of arranging deal to pay Sen Harry Reid to quash a federal investigation.
lead_paragraph: An indicted businessman had accused Attorney General John Swallow of arranging a deal to pay Senator Harry Reid to quash a federal investigation.

headline.main: Utah: Attorney General Is Cleared in Bribery Case
